nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.render

Class Renderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.render.Renderer

  • public class Renderer
extends java.lang.Object
    Class the controls the display and information sent to the Canvas and Inventory classes. To be used by outside packages as a proxy to Canvas and Inventory.
     

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private javax.sound.sampled.Clip backgroundMusic
      the audio clip for the background music.
      private Canvas canvas
      The current instance of the Canvas being used.
      private static Renderer instance
      The current instance of Renderer.
      private Inventory inventory
      The current instance of the Inventory being used.
      private Maze maze
      The current Maze instance, needed to send game information to the canvas and inventory.
      private static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,javax.sound.sampled.Clip> soundEffects
      all of the sound effects for the game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private Renderer()
      Private constructor, creates the Canvas and Inventory instances to be used throughout the project.
